System settings#

The user can use this instrument to read or modify various parameters of the device.

User Guide#

  1. From the menu on the left, you can select the desired instrument.

  2. System time: The current time is set on the device, as it does not have internal time management mechanisms.

  3. Logging: Various data can be saved on an integrated SD card. This section is used to set the time interval for data acquisition to the SD card.

  4. Config values: In this section, most of the deviceâ€™s exposed parameters can be read and written.

  5. Calibrate: This section is responsible for calibrating the device. However, the calibration mechanism is currently not implemented.
